name: "Meme"bumps
description:
Phishy, a girl born in a village of 'Disastria', has grown up loving all sorts of comic. Soon she realizes that her love for "Memes" is a nightmare for her. The problem is so bad that the memes now haunt her all the time.
Help Phishy solve the punny and night terror mystory.

Objective of the Game: Follow the Source of the Music.
Also try to avoid the different "Meme" sounds on the way.

The 2 Incompatible Genres are: Pop culture viral comedy + Horror. (Who knew that even these 'memes' can scare the hell out of you)

This Game uses 3D sound, so it is suggested that you should use headphones while playing.

Controls:
WSAD or Arrow Keys - Movement.
LMB - Clicking.
